title: Does Anyone Know What Will Smith's New $90 Million Netflix Movie Is About?
text:
Does Anyone Know What Will Smith's New $90 Million Netflix Movie Is About? 
Here's the first trailer for Bright. Most Popular By Matt Miller Feb 27, 2017 Maybe you caught the first trailer for Bright , Netflix's new Will Smith movie, that debuted during the Oscars last night. Maybe, even after the massive Best Picture screw-up, those bizarre images are still rattling around somewhere in the back of your mind. Will Smith appears to be a police officer in a near-future police state. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
